content.title: View the App
content.body:
1. From the Your App is ready window, you have two options to view the Enterprise App Store on your mobile device:
    • Launch from your App Store
    • Scan QR Code with Device Camera
  2. Enter the link given under Launch from your App Store or scan the QR code in your mobile device to open the Enterprise App Store.
  3. Click GET next to the app name RecipientsMobile.
  4. The installation file for the mobile app downloads to your mobile device.
    Install this file to open and view the app.
